name: Slomo Jumper
description:
***BE QUICK***

Super awesome beats with chilling thrill can make anyone hungry for this game.

Follow the Master Pink to stay alive when the world is falling apart. Test your reflexes with fast paced jumper and use super ability to modify game outcome. Beware of "The Creep Land" and stay away from Creep, he may eat you alive.

Easy to pick up, but difficult to master, Slomo Jumper will have you playing again and again.

Tap to jump across the platforms, and keep your player from falling!

You won't find a Jumper game that can alter Space and Time! Minimalist design and stunning aesthetics will make this experience marvel.

★ Buy upgrades.

★ Use the ultimate slomo power to stay alive.

★ Unlock Master Pink and be your own Sensei.

★ Or play with cute little jumping rabbit.

★ Show off your score with your friends.

★ Be the best of the best with online leaderboards!

★ Unlock Achievements.

★ Procedural generated endless levels.

★ Configurable graphics to meet your hardware needs.

Simply tap screen to flip side.
